name: Vector Sector (Zaplee)
description:
Vector Sector is a game made in 3 days for the BenBonk Game Jam.

Vector Sector combines action packed combat with dialogue driven gameplay.  In Vector Sector you must figure out which faction is telling the truth and which one is lying and eliminate the lying faction.  However, both factions can become hostile towards you if you damage their ships enough.

It has randomly generated battles, making each playthrough unique.

Original music by: Sledge

This is our first game jam.

Team members: Kletiz, Toadz, BamBanam, and Sledge.
